archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.5.1b: b) frequency of an incident occurring in a set timeframe (e.g. 5 times a year) and the potential financial loss for one occurrence (often used in a quantitative approach).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
